Name.label: Rare genetic systemic or rheumatologic disease

TextSection.Contents: Mixed autoinflammatory and autoimmune syndrome is a group of systemic diseases characterized by mixed patterns of dysregulated innate and/or adaptive immune responses, leading to chronic activation of the immune system and tissue inflammation, which presents clincially with a wide range of variable, concomitant, autoimmune and autoinflammatory manifestations in various organ systems.
